title: Justin Bell! (Racing driver, The Torque Show)
description:
Justin Bell is a racing driver, producer, and host of The Torque Show. He won the  1997 FIA GT2 Championship, the 1998 24 Hours of Le Mans' GT2 class, and raced for Saab, Peugeot, Porsche, BMW, Dodge and General Motors. 

He. Can. Drive.

Find Justin's show here: 

https://www.facebook.com/TorqueShowLive/videos/?ref=page_internal

Watch the show! https://youtu.be/j9OZte1pcrw

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @justinbelltv

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
